nodes.text: Black Spire: Return to a Shattered Planet

"Black Spire: Return to a Shattered Planet" is a short story by Delilah S. Dawson that was published in the paperback of Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire on June 30, 2020. It features Vi Moradi, Chewbacca, and Pook as they travel to Parnassos to rescue Siv and Torbi.
